p: Considering these facts, the BCG vaccine is contemplated as a potential candidate against respiratory viruses [ 48]. Moreover, Muldron Children's Research Institute from Australia already announced a phase III randomized controlled trial, which will determine if healthcare workers' BCG vaccination will have any impact on SARS-CoV-2 infection (BCG Vaccination to Protect Healthcare Workers against COVID-19, BRACE, NCT04327206). However, more time is needed to establish its supposed efficiency.
